movies.name: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: Paul Atreides continues his journey with Chani and the Fremen to seek revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family, facing a choice between love and the universe's fate.

movies.name: The Fall Guy
movies.description: A stuntman gets entangled in a mission to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend’s movie, rekindling old feelings while navigating a dangerous adventure.

movies.name: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
movies.description: Furiosa is kidnapped and ends up in the hands of a biker gang, battling to return to her homeland amidst chaos.

movies.name: Deadpool & Wolverine
movies.description: Deadpool teams up with Wolverine to fight a common threat, facing personal and emotional challenges along the way.

movies.name: Rebel Ridge
movies.description: A gripping thriller about Jack, who escapes a dark past and embarks on a quest for vengeance, facing internal and external struggles.

movies.name: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
movies.description: A group of warriors trapped within the walls of an ancient city must confront internal and external threats to survive.

movies.name: Alinoid: The Return to the Future
movies.description: A tech-savvy young man discovers a time machine, traveling across eras to fix past mistakes, with repercussions for the present and future.

movies.name: The Beekeeper
movies.description: A former operative seeks revenge after betrayal, uncovering a global conspiracy.

movies.name: Argylle
movies.description: A spy suffering from amnesia discovers his past as a writer of espionage novels, leading him into a real-life adventure.

movies.name: Monkey Man
movies.description: A man emerges from prison to confront corruption and crime in society, taking justice into his own hands.

movies.name: Oppenheimer
movies.description: A biographical drama about J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist behind the atomic bomb, exploring his moral dilemmas and the impact of his work.

movies.name: The Holdovers
movies.description: A cantankerous teacher at a boarding school forms an unexpected bond with a troubled student left behind during the holidays.

movies.name: Killers of the Flower Moon
movies.description: Based on true events, this drama explores a series of murders of wealthy Osage Nation members in the 1920s and the birth of the FBI.

movies.name: Napoleon
movies.description: A historical drama that delves into the rise and fall of Napoleon Bonaparte, focusing on his personal relationships and military conquests.

movies.name: The Whale
movies.description: A reclusive English teacher living with severe obesity attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter.

movies.name: Past Lives
movies.description: A tender exploration of love and destiny as childhood friends reunite after decades apart, questioning the paths not taken.

movies.name: Maestro
movies.description: A biographical drama about Leonard Bernstein, focusing on his career as a composer and conductor and his complex personal life.

movies.name: The Son
movies.description: A family drama exploring the challenges of parenting a troubled teenage boy while navigating personal struggles.

movies.name: Women Talking
movies.description: A group of women in a religious colony come together to discuss their future after a series of traumatic events.

movies.name: A Good Person
movies.description: A young woman navigates grief and guilt after a tragic accident, finding solace in an unexpected friendship with her ex-fiancé’s father.

movies.name: Paddington 2
movies.description: The beloved bear Paddington tries to buy a rare book as a gift but gets falsely accused of a crime.

movies.name: The Intern
movies.description: A heartwarming and funny story about a senior citizen who becomes an intern at a startup run by a young entrepreneur.

movies.name: Mrs. Doubtfire
movies.description: A father disguises himself as a nanny to spend more time with his kids after a divorce.

movies.name: Enchanted
movies.description: A fairytale princess is transported to modern-day New York City, leading to hilarious and charming moments.

movies.name: Night at the Museum
movies.description: A museum guard discovers that the exhibits come to life at night, causing chaos and fun.

movies.name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
movies.description: A timid man embarks on unexpected adventures as he seeks courage and purpose in his life.

movies.name: Father of the Bride
movies.description: A father hilariously struggles with planning his daughter’s wedding while coming to terms with her growing up.

movies.name: The Hundred-Foot Journey
movies.description: A heartwarming and humorous story about an Indian family opening a restaurant across from a fancy French eatery, leading to funny cultural clashes.

movies.name: Free Guy
movies.description: A bank teller discovers he’s a background character in a video game and decides to rewrite his story with humor and charm.

movies.name: The Lost City
movies.description: A romance novelist and her cover model find themselves in a real-life adventure filled with comedy and action.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A young hobbit embarks on an epic journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.

movies.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
movies.description: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

movies.name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
movies.description: Four siblings step into a magical wardrobe and find themselves in the enchanted land of Narnia.

movies.name: Pan’s Labyrinth
movies.description: A dark and magical tale of a young girl who discovers a mysterious labyrinth in post-Civil War Spain.

movies.name: The Shape of Water
movies.description: A magical love story between a mute woman and a mysterious aquatic creature in a secret laboratory.

movies.name: Stardust
movies.description: A young man ventures into a magical realm to retrieve a fallen star, which turns out to be a woman.

movies.name: Maleficent
movies.description: The untold story of Disney’s most iconic villain, exploring her transformation and motivations.

movies.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
movies.description: A magizoologist explores 1920s New York with his suitcase full of magical creatures, facing unexpected challenges.

movies.name: The Golden Compass
movies.description: A young girl embarks on a journey to a parallel universe filled with daemons, witches, and armored bears.

movies.name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.description: A young Bilbo Baggins is swept into an epic quest to help a group of dwarves reclaim their homeland from the fearsome dragon Smaug.

games.name: Chess
games.description: A classic strategy game where players compete to checkmate the opponent's king.

games.name: Memory
games.description: A fun game to test and improve your memory by matching pairs of cards.

games.name: Rock Paper Scissors
games.description: A simple game of chance to decide the winner using rock, paper, or scissors.

games.name: HangMan
games.description: A word-guessing game where players attempt to find the word before the hangman is complete.

games.name: Connect 4
games.description: A two-player game where you try to align four discs in a row before your opponent does.

games.name: Ping Pong
games.description: A fast-paced game where players hit a ball back and forth to score points.

games.name: Typing Speed
games.description: Test your typing speed and accuracy by typing as many words as possible in a limited time.

games.name: X / O
games.description: A classic tic-tac-toe game where players try to align three X's or O's in a row.
